existing_features.title: Ensure the in-app editor can successfully load, edit, and save draft website content by using an authenticated backend actor (Internet Identity) for admin-only draft APIs instead of an anonymous actor.

If a non-authenticated or non-admin user attempts to open the editor, show a clear access/authorization message and a path to resolve it (sign in with Internet Identity and/or provide the admin secret token via the existing URL parameter mechanism) rather than a generic load failure.
